column1: Smoque BBQ////What most BBQ places do is make a couple of sauces and then douse everything int he sauce: all the meats
column3: the sausages. Great if you love the sauce! This place had very unique tastes to all the food. The brisket
column7: all were unique and that is a new thing to me in the BBQ world. Unfortunately some of them missed the mark - but not by enough  not to come back.  The biggest thing is that everything is a bit too much
column8: except the noble simple coleslaw which is simple and palate cleansing.
